author: Mark Stevenson
subject: Playstation Game
body:
Has anyone else played the Playstation Game of Cagliostro? It came out about 
3 years ago (or more???) in Japan. I played through it to the end but it was 
kind of short and there was no real challenge, it was just a couple of CDs 
full of nice Lupan style graphics, a few interesting clips and facts from 
the movie. What you did was rescue the girl from the castle. The whole thing 
was in the style of those early C64 text adventures (but with better 
graphics!). If someone knows how to make this game more interesting I'd like 
to know. I think there may be some bonus areas or something.

Also, Lupan merchandise; I have a Lupan III doll from a gas station in 
Japan. You get it when you buy a certain amount of fuel or something. I'll 
see if I can post a photo to the Yahoo! club in the next few weeks. Also, I 
have a full page newspaper add from Japan advertising a 
photocopier/printer/fax/modem thing, using pictures of Lupan, Jigen, Goemon 
and Fujiko. The caption reads; "tanomoshii aibou no odemashi da ze" and 
"kondo wa ichidai shiyaku(4 yaku)". My scanner is on the blink so I'll post 
it later if anyone wants to see it.
